text: Itte yaru ga i. `Kare-ra ga, dore hodo nagaku tairyu shita ka, arra ga mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Kare ni, ten to ji no yugen-kai wa zokusuru. Nanto kare wa yoku gozonji de arare, mata yoku o kiki ni naru koto yo. Kare-ra (iiarasotte iru hitobito) ni wa,(kekkyoku) kare no soto ni wa don'na hogo-sha mo naku, mata nanimono mo, kare no taiken ni san'yo shinai nodearu
